constantValues: Template for a knowledge base article that contains the standard attributes of an article.

members.name: kbArticleTemplateId

constantValues: Unique identifier of the knowledge base article template.

members.description: Unique identifier of the knowledge base article template.

members.name: structureXml

constantValues: XML structure of the knowledge base article.

members.description: XML structure of the knowledge base article.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: Unique identifier of the organization associated with the template.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Unique identifier of the organization associated with the template.

members.name: formatXml

constantValues: XML format of the knowledge base article template.

members.description: XML format of the knowledge base article template.

members.name: title

constantValues: Title of the knowledge base article template.

members.description: Title of the knowledge base article template.

members.name: description

constantValues: Description of the knowledge base article template.

members.description: Description of the knowledge base article template.

members.name: isActive

constantValues: Information about whether the knowledge base article is active.

members.description: Information about whether the knowledge base article is active.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: createdBy

constantValues: Unique identifier of the user who created the knowledge base article template.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Unique identifier of the user who created the knowledge base article template.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: modifiedBy

constantValues: Unique identifier of the user who last modified the knowledge base article template.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Unique identifier of the user who last modified the knowledge base article template.

members.name: createdOn

constantValues: Date and time when the knowledge base article template was created.

members.description: Date and time when the knowledge base article template was created.

members.name: modifiedOn

constantValues: Date and time when the knowledge base article template was last modified.

members.description: Date and time when the knowledge base article template was last modified.

members.name: overriddenCreatedOn

constantValues: Date and time that the record was migrated.

members.description: Date and time that the record was migrated.

members.name: importSequenceNumber

constantValues: Unique identifier of the data import or data migration that created this record.

members.description: Unique identifier of the data import or data migration that created this record.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'componentState_display' is added to the 'ArticleTemplate' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'componentState'
addSupportingAttribute.name: componentState_display

members.name: solutionId

constantValues: Unique identifier of the associated solution.

members.description: Unique identifier of the associated solution.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: createdOnBehalfBy

constantValues: Unique identifier of the delegate user who created the kbarticletemplate.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Unique identifier of the delegate user who created the kbarticletemplate.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: modifiedOnBehalfBy

constantValues: Unique identifier of the delegate user who last modified the kbarticletemplate.

members.name: isCustomizable

constantValues: Information that specifies whether this component can be customized.

members.description: Information that specifies whether this component can be customized.

members.name: introducedVersion

constantValues: Version in which the form is introduced.

members.description: Version in which the form is introduced.
